question: A particle of mass 500 g is at rest. It is free to move along a straight line. The power delivered to the particle varies with time according to the following graph. The momentum of the particle at t=5 s is
images/e5f6a1b2-c3d4-4e5f-2a3b-890123456789.png
explanation: Work Done = Area under P-t graph = Area of trapezium = 0.5 × (2+8) × 5 = 25 J.
Change in Kinetic Energy ΔK = Work Done = 25 J.
